summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 4.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 268 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1849 m), feels like temperature (up 2.6°C), outside temperature (up 2.8°C), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 268.0m lower than yesterday, 790.2m lower than the past week, 1849.3m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 713m to a maximum of 1594m, averaging 799.0m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1589.2m and 2650m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, air moisture should feel ok and near calm conditions. Moderate rainfall, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and it’s dark. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
